headline: Union Pacific (UNP) Margin Improvement Reinforces Bullish Narratives on Profit Quality and Valuation
summary: Union Pacific (UNP) delivered earnings growth of 6.3% over the past year, surpassing its 5-year average of 3.8% per year. Net profit margins improved to 28.7% from 27.3%. Forecasts suggest continued momentum, with earnings expected to climb 8.65% annually and revenue projected to grow by 6.3% per year. With a price-to-earnings ratio of 18.2x, shares are trading below their estimated fair value. The company also offers appeal with its attractive dividend and limited risk profile. See our full...
